1000DATA -5,6
1010DATA -6,480,511,255
1020DATA-1,9,220,10,220,11,220,12,220,16,222,17,220,18,220,19,220,40,216,41,135

1230DATA146,137,147,143,148,137,149,138,150,215,166,222,167,129,168,139,169,132,170,140,171,136
1240DATA172,137,173,141,174,143,175,143,176,137,177,136,178,140,179,140,180,129,181,139,182,212
1250DATA198,129,199,136,200,138,201,137,202,213,203,129,204,141,205,137,206,213,207,129,208,141
1260DATA209,137,210,213,211,129,212,136,213,138,214,137,215,213
1270DATA -4
5 REM VERSION 0.5 BETA FUTURE VERSION WILL NOT BE 100% COMPATABLE BY ROBERT SIEG MC-10 CLUB PUSH222@GMAIL.COM
10 READ A
20 IF A = -1 THEN SC = 0: GOTO10
30 IF A = -2 THEN SC = 256: GOTO10
40 IF A = -3 THEN GOSUB 110: GOTO10
50 IF A = -4 THEN RESTORE:GOTO 200
60 IF A = -5 THEN READ A: GOSUB120:GOTO10
70 IF A = -6 THEN READ B, C, D: GOSUB 140:GOTO10
80 IF A >= 0 THEN A = A + SC: PS = A: READ A: FN = A
90 POKE 16384 + PS, FN
100 GOTO 10
110 FOR Z = 1 TO 100: NEXTZ: RETURN
120 IF A < 9 THEN CLSA: RETURN
130 POKE 49151, A: RETURN
140 FOR A = B + 16384 TO C + 16384: POKEA , D: NEXTA: RETURN
200 FORY=0TO6:FORX=0TO31:LPRINTCHR$(PEEK(16384+32*Y+X));:NEXT:LPRINT:NEXT
299 PRINT@256,;:END
